categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Bestul Pelizmo was a male Human Sith Inquisitor of the reconstituted Sith Empire who visited the town of Raider's Cove on Rishi during the Galactic War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic.
Bestul Pelizmo appears as a Sith inquisitor trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released in 2014.
